fileBaselines.content:
#!/bin/bash
# Script para instalar tema Oh My Posh personalizado no Ubuntu
# Autor: GitHub Copilot
# Data: 2026-01-15

# Cores para output
RED='\033[0;31m'
GREEN='\033[0;32m'
YELLOW='\033[1;33m'
CYAN='\033[0;36m'
NC='\033[0m' # No Color

echo -e "${CYAN}üé® Instalando tema Oh My Posh personalizado...${NC}"

# Verificar se Oh My Posh est√° instalado
echo -e "${YELLOW}üîç Verificando instala√ß√£o do Oh My Posh...${NC}"

if ! command -v oh-my-posh &> /dev/null; then
    echo -e "${RED}‚ùå Oh My Posh n√£o est√° instalado!${NC}"
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üì¶ Instalando Oh My Posh...${NC}"
    
    # Instalar Oh My Posh via curl (m√©todo oficial)
    if curl -s https://ohmyposh.dev/install.sh | bash -s; then
        echo -e "${GREEN}‚úÖ Oh My Posh instalado com sucesso!${NC}"
        
        # Adicionar ao PATH se necess√°rio
        if [[ ":$PATH:" != *":/usr/local/bin:"* ]]; then
            export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/bin
        fi
        
        echo -e "${CYAN}üí° Voc√™ pode precisar reiniciar o terminal para usar o Oh My Posh${NC}"
    else
        echo -e "${RED}‚ùå Erro ao instalar Oh My Posh${NC}"
        echo -e "${YELLOW}üí° Tente instalar manualmente: curl -s https://ohmyposh.dev/install.sh | bash -s${NC}"
        exit 1
    fi
else
    echo -e "${GREEN}‚úÖ Oh My Posh j√° est√° instalado${NC}"
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üîÑ Atualizando Oh My Posh...${NC}"
    
    if sudo oh-my-posh upgrade --force; then
        echo -e "${GREEN}‚úÖ Oh My Posh atualizado com sucesso!${NC}"
    else
        echo -e "${YELLOW}‚ö†Ô∏è  N√£o foi poss√≠vel atualizar, mas continuando com a vers√£o atual${NC}"
    fi
fi

# Diret√≥rio do script (onde est√° o tema local)
SCRIPT_DIR="$(cd "$(dirname "${BASH_SOURCE[0]}")" && pwd)"
LOCAL_THEME_FILE="${SCRIPT_DIR}/blocks.emoji.omp.json"

# Diret√≥rio de temas do Oh My Posh
THEMES_PATH="${HOME}/.poshthemes"

# Nome do arquivo do tema
THEME_NAME="blocks.emoji.omp.json"
THEME_FILE_PATH="${THEMES_PATH}/${THEME_NAME}"

echo -e "${YELLOW}üìÅ Diret√≥rio de temas: ${THEMES_PATH}${NC}"

# Criar diret√≥rio se n√£o existir
if [ ! -d "$THEMES_PATH" ]; then
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üìÇ Criando diret√≥rio de temas...${NC}"
    mkdir -p "$THEMES_PATH"
fi

# Copiar o tema local
if [ -f "$LOCAL_THEME_FILE" ]; then
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üìã Copiando tema local...${NC}"
    if cp "$LOCAL_THEME_FILE" "$THEME_FILE_PATH"; then
        echo -e "${GREEN}‚úÖ Tema copiado com sucesso: ${THEME_FILE_PATH}${NC}"
    else
        echo -e "${RED}‚ùå Erro ao copiar o tema${NC}"
        exit 1
    fi
else
    echo -e "${RED}‚ùå Arquivo de tema n√£o encontrado: ${LOCAL_THEME_FILE}${NC}"
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üí° Certifique-se de executar o script a partir do diret√≥rio correto${NC}"
    exit 1
fi

# Detectar shell (bash ou zsh)
SHELL_NAME=$(basename "$SHELL")
if [ "$SHELL_NAME" = "zsh" ]; then
    PROFILE_FILE="${HOME}/.zshrc"
    INIT_COMMAND="eval \"\$(oh-my-posh init zsh --config ${THEME_FILE_PATH})\""
else
    PROFILE_FILE="${HOME}/.bashrc"
    INIT_COMMAND="eval \"\$(oh-my-posh init bash --config ${THEME_FILE_PATH})\""
fi

echo -e "${YELLOW}üìù Configurando profile: ${PROFILE_FILE}${NC}"

# Criar profile se n√£o existir
if [ ! -f "$PROFILE_FILE" ]; then
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üìù Criando arquivo de profile...${NC}"
    touch "$PROFILE_FILE"
fi

# Verificar se j√° existe configura√ß√£o do Oh My Posh
if grep -q "oh-my-posh init" "$PROFILE_FILE"; then
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üîÑ Atualizando configura√ß√£o existente do Oh My Posh no profile...${NC}"
    
    # Remover linhas antigas do oh-my-posh
    sed -i '/oh-my-posh init/d' "$PROFILE_FILE"
    
    # Adicionar nova configura√ß√£o
    echo "$INIT_COMMAND" >> "$PROFILE_FILE"
    
    echo -e "${GREEN}‚úÖ Configura√ß√£o do Oh My Posh atualizada no profile${NC}"
else
    echo -e "${YELLOW}‚ûï Adicionando Oh My Posh ao profile...${NC}"
    
    # Adicionar linha em branco se o arquivo n√£o estiver vazio
    if [ -s "$PROFILE_FILE" ]; then
        echo "" >> "$PROFILE_FILE"
    fi
    
    # Adicionar configura√ß√£o
    echo "$INIT_COMMAND" >> "$PROFILE_FILE"
    
    echo -e "${GREEN}‚úÖ Oh My Posh adicionado ao profile${NC}"
fi

echo -e "\n${GREEN}‚ú® Instala√ß√£o conclu√≠da!${NC}"
echo -e "${CYAN}üìã Para aplicar as mudan√ßas, execute:${NC}"
echo -e "   ${NC}source ${PROFILE_FILE}${NC}"
echo -e "\n${CYAN}üí° Ou feche e reabra o terminal${NC}"

#!/bin/bash
# Script para instalar tema Oh My Posh personalizado no macOS
# Autor: GitHub Copilot
# Data: 2026-01-15

# Cores para output
RED='\033[0;31m'
GREEN='\033[0;32m'
YELLOW='\033[1;33m'
CYAN='\033[0;36m'
NC='\033[0m' # No Color

echo -e "${CYAN}üé® Instalando tema Oh My Posh personalizado...${NC}"

# Verificar se Homebrew est√° instalado
if ! command -v brew &> /dev/null; then
    echo -e "${RED}‚ùå Homebrew n√£o est√° instalado!${NC}"
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üì¶ Por favor, instale o Homebrew primeiro:${NC}"
    echo -e "   /bin/bash -c \"\$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Homebrew/install/HEAD/install.sh)\""
    exit 1
fi

# Verificar se Oh My Posh est√° instalado
echo -e "${YELLOW}üîç Verificando instala√ß√£o do Oh My Posh...${NC}"

if ! command -v oh-my-posh &> /dev/null; then
    echo -e "${RED}‚ùå Oh My Posh n√£o est√° instalado!${NC}"
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üì¶ Instalando Oh My Posh via Homebrew...${NC}"
    
    if brew install jandedobbeleer/oh-my-posh/oh-my-posh; then
        echo -e "${GREEN}‚úÖ Oh My Posh instalado com sucesso!${NC}"
        echo -e "${CYAN}üí° Voc√™ pode precisar reiniciar o terminal para usar o Oh My Posh${NC}"
    else
        echo -e "${RED}‚ùå Erro ao instalar Oh My Posh${NC}"
        echo -e "${YELLOW}üí° Tente instalar manualmente: brew install jandedobbeleer/oh-my-posh/oh-my-posh${NC}"
        exit 1
    fi
else
    echo -e "${GREEN}‚úÖ Oh My Posh j√° est√° instalado${NC}"
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üîÑ Atualizando Oh My Posh...${NC}"
    
    if sudo oh-my-posh upgrade --force; then
        echo -e "${GREEN}‚úÖ Oh My Posh atualizado com sucesso!${NC}"
    else
        echo -e "${YELLOW}‚ö†Ô∏è  N√£o foi poss√≠vel atualizar, mas continuando com a vers√£o atual${NC}"
    fi
fi

# Diret√≥rio do script (onde est√° o tema local)
SCRIPT_DIR="$(cd "$(dirname "${BASH_SOURCE[0]}")" && pwd)"
LOCAL_THEME_FILE="${SCRIPT_DIR}/blocks.emoji.omp.json"

# Diret√≥rio de temas do Oh My Posh
THEMES_PATH="${HOME}/.poshthemes"

# Nome do arquivo do tema
THEME_NAME="blocks.emoji.omp.json"
THEME_FILE_PATH="${THEMES_PATH}/${THEME_NAME}"

echo -e "${YELLOW}üìÅ Diret√≥rio de temas: ${THEMES_PATH}${NC}"

# Criar diret√≥rio se n√£o existir
if [ ! -d "$THEMES_PATH" ]; then
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üìÇ Criando diret√≥rio de temas...${NC}"
    mkdir -p "$THEMES_PATH"
fi

# Copiar o tema local
if [ -f "$LOCAL_THEME_FILE" ]; then
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üìã Copiando tema local...${NC}"
    if cp "$LOCAL_THEME_FILE" "$THEME_FILE_PATH"; then
        echo -e "${GREEN}‚úÖ Tema copiado com sucesso: ${THEME_FILE_PATH}${NC}"
    else
        echo -e "${RED}‚ùå Erro ao copiar o tema${NC}"
        exit 1
    fi
else
    echo -e "${RED}‚ùå Arquivo de tema n√£o encontrado: ${LOCAL_THEME_FILE}${NC}"
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üí° Certifique-se de executar o script a partir do diret√≥rio correto${NC}"
    exit 1
fi

# Detectar shell (bash ou zsh)
SHELL_NAME=$(basename "$SHELL")
if [ "$SHELL_NAME" = "zsh" ]; then
    PROFILE_FILE="${HOME}/.zshrc"
    INIT_COMMAND="eval \"\$(oh-my-posh init zsh --config ${THEME_FILE_PATH})\""
else
    PROFILE_FILE="${HOME}/.bash_profile"
    INIT_COMMAND="eval \"\$(oh-my-posh init bash --config ${THEME_FILE_PATH})\""
fi

echo -e "${YELLOW}üìù Configurando profile: ${PROFILE_FILE}${NC}"

# Criar profile se n√£o existir
if [ ! -f "$PROFILE_FILE" ]; then
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üìù Criando arquivo de profile...${NC}"
    touch "$PROFILE_FILE"
fi

# Verificar se j√° existe configura√ß√£o do Oh My Posh
if grep -q "oh-my-posh init" "$PROFILE_FILE"; then
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üîÑ Atualizando configura√ß√£o existente do Oh My Posh no profile...${NC}"
    
    # Remover linhas antigas do oh-my-posh (sintaxe macOS para sed -i)
    sed -i '' '/oh-my-posh init/d' "$PROFILE_FILE"
    
    # Adicionar nova configura√ß√£o
    echo "$INIT_COMMAND" >> "$PROFILE_FILE"
    
    echo -e "${GREEN}‚úÖ Configura√ß√£o do Oh My Posh atualizada no profile${NC}"
else
    echo -e "${YELLOW}‚ûï Adicionando Oh My Posh ao profile...${NC}"
    
    # Adicionar linha em branco se o arquivo n√£o estiver vazio
    if [ -s "$PROFILE_FILE" ]; then
        echo "" >> "$PROFILE_FILE"
    fi
    
    # Adicionar configura√ß√£o
    echo "$INIT_COMMAND" >> "$PROFILE_FILE"
    
    echo -e "${GREEN}‚úÖ Oh My Posh adicionado ao profile${NC}"
fi

echo -e "\n${GREEN}‚ú® Instala√ß√£o conclu√≠da!${NC}"
echo -e "${CYAN}üìã Para aplicar as mudan√ßas, execute:${NC}"
echo -e "   ${NC}source ${PROFILE_FILE}${NC}"
echo -e "\n${CYAN}üí° Ou feche e reabra o terminal${NC}"

#!/bin/bash
# Script para instalar tema Oh My Posh personalizado no Ubuntu
# Autor: GitHub Copilot
# Data: 2026-01-15

# Cores para output
RED='\033[0;31m'
GREEN='\033[0;32m'
YELLOW='\033[1;33m'
CYAN='\033[0;36m'
NC='\033[0m' # No Color

echo -e "${CYAN}üé® Instalando tema Oh My Posh personalizado...${NC}"

# Verificar se Oh My Posh est√° instalado
echo -e "${YELLOW}üîç Verificando instala√ß√£o do Oh My Posh...${NC}"

if ! command -v oh-my-posh &> /dev/null; then
    echo -e "${RED}‚ùå Oh My Posh n√£o est√° instalado!${NC}"
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üì¶ Instalando Oh My Posh...${NC}"
    
    # Instalar Oh My Posh via curl (m√©todo oficial)
    if curl -s https://ohmyposh.dev/install.sh | bash -s; then
        echo -e "${GREEN}‚úÖ Oh My Posh instalado com sucesso!${NC}"
        
        # Adicionar ao PATH se necess√°rio
        if [[ ":$PATH:" != *":/usr/local/bin:"* ]]; then
            export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/bin
        fi
        
        echo -e "${CYAN}üí° Voc√™ pode precisar reiniciar o terminal para usar o Oh My Posh${NC}"
    else
        echo -e "${RED}‚ùå Erro ao instalar Oh My Posh${NC}"
        echo -e "${YELLOW}üí° Tente instalar manualmente: curl -s https://ohmyposh.dev/install.sh | bash -s${NC}"
        exit 1
    fi
else
    echo -e "${GREEN}‚úÖ Oh My Posh j√° est√° instalado${NC}"
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üîÑ Atualizando Oh My Posh...${NC}"
    
    if sudo oh-my-posh upgrade --force; then
        echo -e "${GREEN}‚úÖ Oh My Posh atualizado com sucesso!${NC}"
    else
        echo -e "${YELLOW}‚ö†Ô∏è  N√£o foi poss√≠vel atualizar, mas continuando com a vers√£o atual${NC}"
    fi
fi

# Script directory (where the local theme is)
SCRIPT_DIR="$(cd "$(dirname "${BASH_SOURCE[0]}")" && pwd)"
LOCAL_THEME_FILE="${SCRIPT_DIR}/blocks.emoji.omp.json"

# Oh My Posh themes directory
THEMES_PATH="${HOME}/.poshthemes"

# Theme file name
THEME_NAME="blocks.emoji.omp.json"
THEME_FILE_PATH="${THEMES_PATH}/${THEME_NAME}"

echo -e "${YELLOW}üìÅ Themes directory: ${THEMES_PATH}${NC}"

# Create directory if it doesn't exist
if [ ! -d "$THEMES_PATH" ]; then
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üìÇ Creating themes directory...${NC}"
    mkdir -p "$THEMES_PATH"
fi

# Copy local theme
if [ -f "$LOCAL_THEME_FILE" ]; then
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üìã Copying local theme...${NC}"
    if cp "$LOCAL_THEME_FILE" "$THEME_FILE_PATH"; then
        echo -e "${GREEN}‚úÖ Theme copied successfully: ${THEME_FILE_PATH}${NC}"
    else
        echo -e "${RED}‚ùå Error copying theme${NC}"
        exit 1
    fi
else
    echo -e "${RED}‚ùå Theme file not found: ${LOCAL_THEME_FILE}${NC}"
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üí° Make sure to run the script from the correct directory${NC}"
    exit 1
fi

# Detectar shell (bash ou zsh)
SHELL_NAME=$(basename "$SHELL")
if [ "$SHELL_NAME" = "zsh" ]; then
    PROFILE_FILE="${HOME}/.zshrc"
    INIT_COMMAND="eval \"\$(oh-my-posh init zsh --config ${THEME_FILE_PATH})\""
else
    PROFILE_FILE="${HOME}/.bashrc"
    INIT_COMMAND="eval \"\$(oh-my-posh init bash --config ${THEME_FILE_PATH})\""
fi

echo -e "${YELLOW}üìù Configurando profile: ${PROFILE_FILE}${NC}"

# Criar profile se n√£o existir
if [ ! -f "$PROFILE_FILE" ]; then
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üìù Criando arquivo de profile...${NC}"
    touch "$PROFILE_FILE"
fi

# Verificar se j√° existe configura√ß√£o do Oh My Posh
if grep -q "oh-my-posh init" "$PROFILE_FILE"; then
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üîÑ Atualizando configura√ß√£o existente do Oh My Posh no profile...${NC}"
    
    # Remover linhas antigas do oh-my-posh
    sed -i '/oh-my-posh init/d' "$PROFILE_FILE"
    
    # Adicionar nova configura√ß√£o
    echo "$INIT_COMMAND" >> "$PROFILE_FILE"
    
    echo -e "${GREEN}‚úÖ Configura√ß√£o do Oh My Posh atualizada no profile${NC}"
else
    echo -e "${YELLOW}‚ûï Adicionando Oh My Posh ao profile...${NC}"
    
    # Adicionar linha em branco se o arquivo n√£o estiver vazio
    if [ -s "$PROFILE_FILE" ]; then
        echo "" >> "$PROFILE_FILE"
    fi
    
    # Adicionar configura√ß√£o
    echo "$INIT_COMMAND" >> "$PROFILE_FILE"
    
    echo -e "${GREEN}‚úÖ Oh My Posh adicionado ao profile${NC}"
fi

echo -e "\n${GREEN}‚ú® Instala√ß√£o conclu√≠da!${NC}"
echo -e "${CYAN}üìã Para aplicar as mudan√ßas, execute:${NC}"
echo -e "   ${NC}source ${PROFILE_FILE}${NC}"
echo -e "\n${CYAN}üí° Ou feche e reabra o terminal${NC}"

#!/bin/bash
# Script para instalar tema Oh My Posh personalizado no macOS
# Autor: GitHub Copilot
# Data: 2026-01-15

# Cores para output
RED='\033[0;31m'
GREEN='\033[0;32m'
YELLOW='\033[1;33m'
CYAN='\033[0;36m'
NC='\033[0m' # No Color

echo -e "${CYAN}üé® Instalando tema Oh My Posh personalizado...${NC}"

# Verificar se Homebrew est√° instalado
if ! command -v brew &> /dev/null; then
    echo -e "${RED}‚ùå Homebrew n√£o est√° instalado!${NC}"
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üì¶ Por favor, instale o Homebrew primeiro:${NC}"
    echo -e "   /bin/bash -c \"\$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Homebrew/install/HEAD/install.sh)\""
    exit 1
fi

# Verificar se Oh My Posh est√° instalado
echo -e "${YELLOW}üîç Verificando instala√ß√£o do Oh My Posh...${NC}"

if ! command -v oh-my-posh &> /dev/null; then
    echo -e "${RED}‚ùå Oh My Posh n√£o est√° instalado!${NC}"
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üì¶ Instalando Oh My Posh via Homebrew...${NC}"
    
    if brew install jandedobbeleer/oh-my-posh/oh-my-posh; then
        echo -e "${GREEN}‚úÖ Oh My Posh instalado com sucesso!${NC}"
        echo -e "${CYAN}üí° Voc√™ pode precisar reiniciar o terminal para usar o Oh My Posh${NC}"

    fi
fi

# Script directory (where the local theme is)
SCRIPT_DIR="$(cd "$(dirname "${BASH_SOURCE[0]}")" && pwd)"

# Create directory if it doesn't exist
if [ ! -d "$THEMES_PATH" ]; then
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üìÇ Creating themes directory...${NC}"
    mkdir -p "$THEMES_PATH"
fi

# Copy local theme
if [ -f "$LOCAL_THEME_FILE" ]; then
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üìã Copying local theme...${NC}"
    if cp "$LOCAL_THEME_FILE" "$THEME_FILE_PATH"; then
        echo -e "${GREEN}‚úÖ Theme copied successfully: ${THEME_FILE_PATH}${NC}"
    else
        echo -e "${RED}‚ùå Error copying theme${NC}"
        exit 1
    fi
else
    echo -e "${RED}‚ùå Theme file not found: ${LOCAL_THEME_FILE}${NC}"
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üí° Make sure to run the script from the correct directory${NC}"
    exit 1
fi

# Detectar shell (bash ou zsh)
SHELL_NAME=$(basename "$SHELL")
if [ "$SHELL_NAME" = "zsh" ]; then
    PROFILE_FILE="${HOME}/.zshrc"
    INIT_COMMAND="eval \"\$(oh-my-posh init zsh --config ${THEME_FILE_PATH})\""
else
    PROFILE_FILE="${HOME}/.bash_profile"
    INIT_COMMAND="eval \"\$(oh-my-posh init bash --config ${THEME_FILE_PATH})\""
fi

echo -e "${YELLOW}üìù Configurando profile: ${PROFILE_FILE}${NC}"

# Criar profile se n√£o existir
if [ ! -f "$PROFILE_FILE" ]; then
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üìù Criando arquivo de profile...${NC}"
    touch "$PROFILE_FILE"
fi

# Verificar se j√° existe configura√ß√£o do Oh My Posh
if grep -q "oh-my-posh init" "$PROFILE_FILE"; then
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üîÑ Atualizando configura√ß√£o existente do Oh My Posh no profile...${NC}"
    
    # Remover linhas antigas do oh-my-posh (sintaxe macOS para sed -i)
    sed -i '' '/oh-my-posh init/d' "$PROFILE_FILE"
    
    # Adicionar nova configura√ß√£o
    echo "$INIT_COMMAND" >> "$PROFILE_FILE"
    
    echo -e "${GREEN}‚úÖ Configura√ß√£o do Oh My Posh atualizada no profile${NC}"
else
    echo -e "${YELLOW}‚ûï Adicionando Oh My Posh ao profile...${NC}"
    
    # Adicionar linha em branco se o arquivo n√£o estiver vazio
    if [ -s "$PROFILE_FILE" ]; then
        echo "" >> "$PROFILE_FILE"
    fi
    
    # Adicionar configura√ß√£o
    echo "$INIT_COMMAND" >> "$PROFILE_FILE"
    
    echo -e "${GREEN}‚úÖ Oh My Posh adicionado ao profile${NC}"
fi

echo -e "\n${GREEN}‚ú® Instala√ß√£o conclu√≠da!${NC}"
echo -e "${CYAN}üìã Para aplicar as mudan√ßas, execute:${NC}"
echo -e "   ${NC}source ${PROFILE_FILE}${NC}"
echo -e "\n${CYAN}üí° Ou feche e reabra o terminal${NC}"

edits.text:
Detectar onde o Oh My Posh est√° instalado
OMP_INSTALL_DIR=""
if [ -f "${HOME}/.local/bin/oh-my-posh" ]; then
    OMP_INSTALL_DIR="${HOME}/.local/bin"
elif [ -f "/usr/local/bin/oh-my-posh" ]; then
    OMP_INSTALL_DIR="/usr/local/bin"
fi

# Comando para adicionar ao PATH (se necess√°rio)
PATH_COMMAND=""
if [ -n "$OMP_INSTALL_DIR" ] && [ "$OMP_INSTALL_DIR" = "${HOME}/.local/bin" ]; then
    PATH_COMMAND="export PATH=\"\$HOME/.local/bin:\$PATH\""
fi

# Verificar se j√° existe configura√ß√£o do Oh My Posh
if grep -q "oh-my-posh init" "$PROFILE_FILE"; then
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üîÑ Atualizando configura√ß√£o existente do Oh My Posh no profile...${NC}"
    
    # Remover linhas antigas do oh-my-posh
    sed -i '/oh-my-posh init/d' "$PROFILE_FILE"
    
    # Adicionar PATH se necess√°rio e ainda n√£o existir
    if [ -n "$PATH_COMMAND" ] && ! grep -q '\.local/bin' "$PROFILE_FILE"; then

        echo "" >> "$PROFILE_FILE"

        echo "$PATH_COMMAND" >> "$PROFILE_FILE"
    fi
    
    # Adicionar nova configura√ß√£o
    echo "$INIT_COMMAND" >> "$PROFILE_FILE"

Detectar onde o Oh My Posh est√° instalado (Homebrew coloca em locais diferentes)
OMP_INSTALL_DIR=""
if [ -f "/opt/homebrew/bin/oh-my-posh" ]; then
    OMP_INSTALL_DIR="/opt/homebrew/bin"
elif [ -f "/usr/local/bin/oh-my-posh" ]; then
    OMP_INSTALL_DIR="/usr/local/bin"
elif [ -f "${HOME}/.local/bin/oh-my-posh" ]; then
    OMP_INSTALL_DIR="${HOME}/.local/bin"
fi

# Comando para adicionar ao PATH (se necess√°rio)
PATH_COMMAND=""
if [ -n "$OMP_INSTALL_DIR" ]; then
    if [ "$OMP_INSTALL_DIR" = "${HOME}/.local/bin" ]; then
        PATH_COMMAND="export PATH=\"\$HOME/.local/bin:\$PATH\""
    elif [ "$OMP_INSTALL_DIR" = "/opt/homebrew/bin" ]; then
        PATH_COMMAND="export PATH=\"/opt/homebrew/bin:\$PATH\""
    fi
fi

if grep -q "oh-my-posh init" "$PROFILE_FILE"; then

            echo "" >> "$PROFILE_FILE"
            echo "# Oh My Posh - PATH" >> "$PROFILE_FILE"

        fi
    fi

else

shell (bash or zsh)
SHELL_NAME=$(basename "$SHELL")
if [ "$SHELL_NAME" = "zsh" ]; then
    PROFILE_FILE="${HOME}/.zshrc"
    INIT_COMMAND="eval \"\$(oh-my-posh init zsh --config ${THEME_FILE_PATH})\""
else
    PROFILE_FILE="${HOME}/.bashrc"
    INIT_COMMAND="eval \"\$(oh-my-posh init bash --config ${THEME_FILE_PATH})\""
fi

echo -e "${YELLOW}üìù Configuring profile: ${PROFILE_FILE}${NC}"

# Create profile if it doesn't exist
if [ ! -f "$PROFILE_FILE" ]; then
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üìù Creating profile file...${NC}"
    touch "$PROFILE_FILE"
fi

# Detect where Oh My Posh is installed
OMP_INSTALL_DIR=""
if [ -f "${HOME}/.local/bin/oh-my-posh" ]; then
    OMP_INSTALL_DIR="${HOME}/.local/bin"
elif [ -f "/usr/local/bin/oh-my-posh" ]; then
    OMP_INSTALL_DIR="/usr/local/bin"
fi

# Command to add to PATH (if needed)
PATH_COMMAND=""
if [ -n "$OMP_INSTALL_DIR" ] && [ "$OMP_INSTALL_DIR" = "${HOME}/.local/bin" ]; then
    PATH_COMMAND="export PATH=\"\$HOME/.local/bin:\$PATH\""
fi

# Check if Oh My Posh configuration already exists
if grep -q "oh-my-posh init" "$PROFILE_FILE"; then
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üîÑ Updating existing Oh My Posh configuration in profile...${NC}"
    
    # Remove old oh-my-posh lines
    sed -i '/oh-my-posh init/d' "$PROFILE_FILE"
    
    # Add PATH if needed and not already present
    if [ -n "$PATH_COMMAND" ] && ! grep -q '\.local/bin' "$PROFILE_FILE"; then
        echo -e "${YELLOW}üìç Adding ~/.local/bin to PATH...${NC}"
        echo "" >> "$PROFILE_FILE"
        echo "# Oh My Posh - PATH" >> "$PROFILE_FILE"
        echo "$PATH_COMMAND" >> "$PROFILE_FILE"
    fi
    
    # Add new configuration
    echo "$INIT_COMMAND" >> "$PROFILE_FILE"
    
    echo -e "${GREEN}‚úÖ Oh My Posh configuration updated in profile${NC}"
else
    echo -e "${YELLOW}‚ûï Adding Oh My Posh to profile...${NC}"
    
    # Add blank line if file is not empty
    if [ -s "$PROFILE_FILE" ]; then
        echo "" >> "$PROFILE_FILE"
    fi
    
    # Add PATH if needed and not already present
    if [ -n "$PATH_COMMAND" ] && ! grep -q '\.local/bin' "$PROFILE_FILE"; then
        echo -e "${YELLOW}üìç Adding ~/.local/bin to PATH...${NC}"
        echo "# Oh My Posh - PATH" >> "$PROFILE_FILE"
        echo "$PATH_COMMAND" >> "$PROFILE_FILE"
        echo "" >> "$PROFILE_FILE"
    fi
    
    # Add configuration
    echo "# Oh My Posh - Theme" >> "$PROFILE_FILE"
    echo "$INIT_COMMAND" >> "$PROFILE_FILE"
    
    echo -e "${GREEN}‚úÖ Oh My Posh added to profile${NC}"
fi

echo -e "\n${GREEN}‚ú® Installation complete!${NC}"
echo -e "${CYAN}üìã To apply the changes, run:${NC}"
echo -e "   ${NC}source ${PROFILE_FILE}${NC}"
echo -e "\n${CYAN}üí° Or close and reopen the

to install custom Oh My Posh theme on Ubuntu
# Author: GitHub Copilot
# Date: 2026-01-15

# Colors for output
RED='\033[0;31m'
GREEN='\033[0;32m'
YELLOW='\033[1;33m'
CYAN='\033[0;36m'
NC='\033[0m' # No Color

echo -e "${CYAN}üé® Installing custom Oh My Posh theme...${NC}"

# Check if Oh My Posh is installed
echo -e "${YELLOW}üîç Checking Oh My Posh installation...${NC}"

if ! command -v oh-my-posh &> /dev/null; then
    echo -e "${RED}‚ùå Oh My Posh is not installed!${NC}"
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üì¶ Installing Oh My Posh...${NC}"
    
    # Install Oh My Posh via curl (official method)
    if curl -s https://ohmyposh.dev/install.sh | bash -s; then
        echo -e "${GREEN}‚úÖ Oh My Posh installed successfully!${NC}"
        
        # Add to PATH if needed
        if [[ ":$PATH:" != *":/usr/local/bin:"* ]]; then
            export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/bin
        fi
        if [[ ":$PATH:" != *":$HOME/.local/bin:"* ]]; then
            export PATH=$PATH:$HOME/.local/bin
        fi
        
        echo -e "${CYAN}üí° You may need to restart the terminal to use Oh My Posh${NC}"
    else
        echo -e "${RED}‚ùå Error installing Oh My Posh${NC}"
        echo -e "${YELLOW}üí° Try installing manually: curl -s https://ohmyposh.dev/install.sh | bash -s${NC}"
        exit 1
    fi
else
    echo -e "${GREEN}‚úÖ Oh My Posh is already installed${NC}"
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üîÑ Updating Oh My Posh...${NC}"
    
    if sudo oh-my-posh upgrade --force; then
        echo -e "${GREEN}‚úÖ Oh My Posh updated successfully!${NC}"
    else
        echo -e "${YELLOW}‚ö†Ô∏è  Could not update, but continuing with current version

to install custom Oh My Posh theme on macOS
# Author: GitHub Copilot
# Date: 2026-01-15

# Colors for output
RED='\033[0;31m'
GREEN='\033[0;32m'
YELLOW='\033[1;33m'
CYAN='\033[0;36m'
NC='\033[0m' # No Color

echo -e "${CYAN}üé® Installing custom Oh My Posh theme...${NC}"

# Check if Homebrew is installed
if ! command -v brew &> /dev/null; then
    echo -e "${RED}‚ùå Homebrew is not installed!${NC}"
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üì¶ Please install Homebrew first:${NC}"
    echo -e "   /bin/bash -c \"\$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Homebrew/install/HEAD/install.sh)\""
    exit 1
fi

# Check if Oh My Posh is installed
echo -e "${YELLOW}üîç Checking Oh My Posh installation...${NC}"

if ! command -v oh-my-posh &> /dev/null; then
    echo -e "${RED}‚ùå Oh My Posh is not installed!${NC}"
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üì¶ Installing Oh My Posh via Homebrew...${NC}"
    
    if brew install jandedobbeleer/oh-my-posh/oh-my-posh; then
        echo -e "${GREEN}‚úÖ Oh My Posh installed successfully!${NC}"
        echo -e "${CYAN}üí° You may need to restart the terminal to use Oh My Posh${NC}"
    else
        echo -e "${RED}‚ùå Error installing Oh My Posh${NC}"
        echo -e "${YELLOW}üí° Try installing manually: brew install jandedobbeleer/oh-my-posh/oh-my-posh${NC}"
        exit 1
    fi
else
    echo -e "${GREEN}‚úÖ Oh My Posh is already installed${NC}"
    echo -e "${YELLOW}üîÑ Updating Oh My Posh...${NC}"
    
    if sudo oh-my-posh upgrade --force; then
        echo -e "${GREEN}‚úÖ Oh My Posh updated successfully!${NC}"
    else
        echo -e "${YELLOW}‚ö†Ô∏è  Could not update, but continuing with current version
